    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Achievement
    The Achievement class represents the achievements screen of the game.
    ComicScene
    The short comic that tells you a short story about how you get your pet
    CustomFont
    Custom fonts are available to be used for text
    Gameplay
    The Gameplay classes is the gameplay of the entire game where the user interacts with the pet.
    GameplayTest
    Unit tests for the Gameplay class.
    Inventory
    The Inventory class creates the inventory for the gameplay
    InventoryTest
    Unit tests for the Inventory class.
    LoadDataFile
    The Load Data file class saves and loads the data from a file into a JSON file
    LoadDataFileTest
    Unit tests for the LoadDataFile class.
    LoadGame
    The LoadGame class represents the window for loading saved games into slots
    MainMenu
    The MainMenu class represents the main menu of the game
    MainMenuTest
    Unit tests for the MainMenu class.
    ParentalPage
    Represents the Parental Controls page in the application.
    Play
    Represents a window in the application.
    PlayAudio
    The PlayAudio class creates the background music and audio press sound effect
    PlayAudioTest
    Unit tests for the PlayAudio class.
    Playtime
    The logic behind various user playtimes for the game
    PlaytimeTest
    Unit test for the Playtime class.
    Popup
    The Popup class creates a popup when the user receives an item
    PopupTest
    Unit tests for the Popup class.
    RoundedIconButton
    The RoundedIconButton class rounds the corners of a button
    SaveSlot
    The SaveSlot class stores the game file that was used in the last play session0
    Settings
    The Settings class represents the settings of the game
    SettingsTest
    Unit tests for the Settings class.
    Tutorial
    Provides user guidelines on how to play the game and what each button does
    Welcome
    The initial window that opens when running the program.
    WelcomeTest
    Unit tests for the Welcome class.
    Window
    The Window class creates the initial layout for other windows
